query: SELECT 'consultorId direto' as fonte, a.consultorId, IFNULL(c.name, 'SEM CONSULTOR VINCULADO') as mentor_nome FROM alunos a LEFT JOIN consultors c ON a.consultorId = c.id WHERE a.name LIKE '%Joseane%' UNION ALL SELECT 'sessao mais recente' as fonte, ms.consultorId, c.name as mentor_nome FROM mentoring_sessions ms JOIN consultors c ON ms.consultorId = c.id WHERE ms.alunoId = (SELECT id FROM alunos WHERE name LIKE '%Joseane%') ORDER BY fonte DESC LIMIT 5;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2kPX7CjhqdMFT8y.9c22f9f54902 --database 5n7arrGNHjNdoFCMzyGXcY --execute SELECT 'consultorId direto' as fonte, a.consultorId, IFNULL(c.name, 'SEM CONSULTOR VINCULADO') as mentor_nome FROM alunos a LEFT JOIN consultors c ON a.consultorId = c.id WHERE a.name LIKE '%Joseane%' UNION ALL SELECT 'sessao mais recente' as fonte, ms.consultorId, c.name as mentor_nome FROM mentoring_sessions ms JOIN consultors c ON ms.consultorId = c.id WHERE ms.alunoId = (SELECT id FROM alunos WHERE name LIKE '%Joseane%') ORDER BY fonte DESC LIMIT 5;
